programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny's former partner is accused of planting evidence in order to close a murder case; anti-government activists threaten to burn an American flag.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Frank worries when his first partner announces plans to publish a book containing stories of their early days on the force; Jamie and Eddie face choices that will affect their futures in the department and their relationship.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: A mobster is found shot in his car and his low-level errand boy is tied up in the trunk; an NYPD officer asks for a new shield number -- the same number as Frank's deceased son Joe.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: A respected, recently retired NYPD lieutenant is accused of shooting potential muggers on the subway; Baez and Danny try to arrest a drug dealer responsible for a murder Baez witnessed as a child.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Multiple women take credit for murdering the man they worked for; Frank and his priest clash over how to deal with a boy who has been stealing from the church; Nicky gets into trouble.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Erin struggles with guilt when a man she set free is suspected of killing a cop; Frank and Mayor Poole face off regarding Frank's reappointment as commissioner; a police officer disappears.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Linda asks Danny and Baez for help when a co-worker has trouble with an angry ex; Erin's former mentor, a judge, has been handing out unfair sentences since the death of his wife; Frank deals with an outspoken city council speaker.

programme.desc: A has-been partner and loan sharks complicate Sonny's cross-country run against time.

programme.desc: A man who escaped from prison to save his son holds Sonny and Will hostage.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When Sebastian is injured while unsuccessfully trying to prevent a kidnapping, NCIS races to find the missing woman and her abductors; the team gets a peek into Agent Carter's personal life.

programme.desc: The team pursues a crafty serial rapist; Sgt. Voight finds himself resisting some old, familiar tendencies in his quest for justice.

programme.desc: The shocking murder of a young pregnant woman leads the team on a desperate hunt for the killer, revealing something even darker than expected; Burgess has to make a tough decision about Makayla.

programme.desc: Voight and the team muster all their expertise to bring down a deadly crime ring; Burgess finds herself in a dangerous situation.
